answers.answer: Hello, this is my 2nd pregnancy with preeclamplsia and I hear ya, painful swelling is not fun. Are you on any bp meds? It could be you need them adjusted. Otherwise unfortunately preeclamplsia can change pretty quickly if your symptoms aren't being managed. If you are concerned at all I would just go in. I've had to call l&d before on the weekend because my ob is closed and they've told me its normal then seen my dr on monday morning and he's had me admitted. Told me to just tell l&d I'm coming in, don't bother arguing with them. Wishing you and baby all the best!

Thank you ive not been feeling right at all im going to hope im ok for the night and call my dr first thing in the morning l&d always acts like its nothing then my dr takes it more seriously the hospital here is a joke im so frustrated if i wasnt so close id go the next town over

question: So ive been diagnosed with preeclampsia and the past few days ive had swelling in my right ankle and pain all the way up my right leg my blood pressure has been higihighi  i have a headache i dont feel right i called l&d they said it sounds like nothing and im worried i don't know what to do im scheduled to be induced next friday but i feel like my drs are just idiots with how they've been jerking me around here lately
title: preeclampsia and edema please help
